drupalNodeEvent.title: India and China at an Inflection Point

field_speakers.processed: Ambassador Nirupama Rao, India's former ambassador to the United States, China and Sri Lanka

field_description.processed: Nirupama Rao, India's former Ambassador to China and the U.S. and Pacific Leadership Fellow at the Center for Global Transformation at GPS, addresses whether the recent India-China crisis at the Himalayan border signals the end of India's “strategic autonomy” at a challenging time for the Indian economy amid a pandemic.
